feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator Lands on Xbox Series X|S and with Xbox Game Pass on July 27
entry.summary: The stunning visuals, detailed aircraft, and authentic flight experiences that PC simulation fans love will now be available on your Xbox console

entry.title: Release Notes (1.17.3.0) World Update V: Nordics Now Available!
entry.summary: Release Notes for Version 1.17.3.0 (World Update V: Nordics) are now available. Please launch the Microsoft Store or Steam to download the latest update.

entry.title: June 17th, 2021 Development Update
entry.summary: We are overwhelmed by the community response after our E3 Announcement reveal! If you missed it (first of all, how?!), check out this extended interview from Xbox Games Showcase Extended where Jorg Neumann discusses some of the new features.

entry.title: June 24th, 2021 Development Update
entry.summary: If you missed Dev Q&A: Part 1 or the SDK Q&A last week, you can now view them on Youtube here. Our biggest Q&A yet is next Wednesday, June 30th at 10:30am PDT as we meet with the devs for Part 2 – Xbox/PC Improvements and Updates! We can’t wait to meet with you and answer some of the questions we’ve seen floating around the community.

entry.title: PerformancePLUS Flighting Opportunity
entry.summary: Thank you to everyone who has helped provide feedback in previous builds! We are excited to announce our next flighting opportunity – PerformancePLUS. This build has significant performance updates and more, and we seek users who are willing to provide feedback from a diverse range of setups, peripherals, and experience.
